extendedInfo.description: Sense Ball is a simple but fast-paced and addictive game, the goal of it is to direct a ball to the exit point of each level by motion control, and you have to move the ball through specific bricks to break them before you can get through the exit point. Title your device to make the ball roll through different path, it challenges your sense of balance and gravity, you need to try again if the ball get out of the path when it is moving, so, be careful!
